r.s: Class for parsing and handling URL.
r.d: Provides parsing of URLs into their constituent parts (scheme, host, path etc.), URL generation, and resolving of relative URLs.
r.n: * Fixed #14399 (Errors in URL parsing (items #1 and #3)) * Fixed #14735 (Encode query string values) * Fixed #15546 (Add adding __toString()) * Fixed #15367 (Use RFC 3986-compliant version of rawurlencode() in PHP < 5.2) * Fixed #14289 (Add __get() and __set())
